summary: A baker in small-town Minnesota turns amateur sleuth after finding her friend and delivery driver shot to death behind her shop.
cast: Alison Sweeney|Cameron Mathison|Lisa Durupt|Toby Levins|Juliana Wimbles|Barbara Niven|Pauline Egan|Gabriel Hogan|Susan Hogan|Linda Darlow|Meredith McGeachie|Douglas Chapman|Jason Cermak|William Vaughan|Enid-Raye Adams|Rebecca Toolan|Marion Eisman|Maxine Miller|Howard Storey|Dee Jay Jackson|Rhona Rees|John Shaw|Robyn Ross|Connor Paton
title: A Chocolate Chip Cookie Mystery
